meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tiny.
meanings.sent1: The tininesses of the toy car made it easy to carry around.
meanings.sent2: I was amazed by the tininesses of the ladybug crawling on the leaf.
meanings.sent3: The tininesses of the kitten made it look even cuter in the oversized bed.
meanings.sent4: In the vast forest, the tininesses of the fireflies seemed like tiny stars on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The tininesses of the pebbles on the beach created a beautiful mosaic of colors.

meanings.sent1: The tininesses kitten played with a small ball of yarn.
meanings.sent2: The tininesses flower in the garden attracted many bees.
meanings.sent3: The tininesses cupcake was too cute to eat.
meanings.sent4: The tininesses bird's nest was hidden among the branches.
meanings.sent5: The tininesses mushroom in the forest looked like a tiny umbrella.
